actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of out-of-hospital prescription drugs, eye glasses, hearing aids and dentures.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Medicare program for: (1) eyeglasses and examinations for the purpose of prescribing eyeglasses; (2) out-of-hospital prescription drugs; (3) hearing aids and examination for hearing aids; and (4) dentures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of out-of-hospital prescription drugs, eye glasses, hearing aids and dentures.
